option.name: content
option.value: Use Conventional Commit format Never include quotes or special characters

list.name: Changes
list.comment:
refactor: remove HalMicVisualizer and add ESLint and TypeScript configurations
Remove `HalMicVisualizer` component and its associated logic since it's no longer needed. Introduce ESLint with `next/core-web-vitals` and `next/typescript` for code quality and consistency. Add a TypeScript declaration file to support Next.js configurations.

task.summary: Default task
Initial project
Initial project

Add IntelliJ IDEA project configuration files
This commit introduces IntelliJ IDEA's `.idea` directory with project-specific configuration files. These files define settings for VCS, workspace, modules, and project structure, enabling consistent development setups across environments.

Add generated Cargo.lock file to track dependencies
This commit includes the addition of the `Cargo.lock` file, which is automatically generated by Cargo. It helps ensure consistent dependency versions across different environments and is critical for reproducible builds. The file should not be manually edited.

Update IntelliJ config for new Tauri dev setup
This commit adds the `npm.tauri:dev` run configuration and updates related IntelliJ settings. Adjustments include changes to the workspace, RunManager, and shared indexes, ensuring seamless development for the Tauri project.

Add support for microphone recording using Tauri plugin
Integrated the `tauri-plugin-mic-recorder` to enable microphone recording capabilities. Updated dependencies in `Cargo.toml` and `package-lock.json`, adjusted the application logic, and registered the plugin in the Tauri app.
docs: update README formatting and inferred feature details

feat: add OpenAI library and update dependencies in package-lock
Added OpenAI library for integration and updated package-lock.json with new dependencies for compatibility. Renamed and reorganized source files for better clarity.

feat: remove unused assets and refactor OpenAI TTS implementation
This commit removes redundant SVG assets and consolidates TTS logic by deleting tts.ts and migrating functionality to synthesize.ts. Additionally, minor improvements in audio processing and dependency cleanup were made for better maintainability.

feat: remove unused assets and refactor OpenAI TTS implementation
This commit removes redundant SVG assets and consolidates TTS logic by deleting tts.ts and migrating functionality to synthesize.ts. Additionally, minor improvements in audio processing and dependency cleanup were made for better maintainability.
chore: update IDE workspace settings

refactor(audio): improve rms handling and remove redundant volume variable
- Adjusted RMS as the primary volume measure to simplify logic. - Removed redundant `averageVolume` variable. - Minor refactor to simplify `sliceWidth` calculation.

refactor(audio): optimize volume calculation with RMS and remove redundancy
- Simplified logic by using RMS as the primary volume measure. - Eliminated unnecessary `averageVolume` variable. - Streamlined `sliceWidth` calculation.
refactor: optimize RMS volume calculation and remove redundancy in audio logic
refactor: optimize RMS volume calculation and remove redundancy in audio logic

feat: add macOS microphone permissions and integrate with audio processing
- Added macOS microphone permissions using `tauri-plugin-macos-permissions`. - Updated `Info.plist` with microphone usage description. - Integrated microphone permission check in audio processing logic. - Updated dependencies and configurations for `tauri-plugin-macos-permissions`.

feat: standardize canvas methods and add macOS microphone permissions
- Updated canvas-related methods with standardized English documentation. - Added macOS microphone permissions using tauri-plugin-macos-permissions. - Integrated microphone permission check into audio processing logic. - Updated dependencies and configurations for microphone permissions support.

feat: refactor audio processing and introduce modular architecture
- Replaced audio.ts with audioController.ts and audioVisualizer.ts for modularity. - Improved class-based structure for audio control and visualization. - Removed redundant code and standardized canvas handling methods. - Integrated microphone

feat: remove audio controller and improve modular structure
- Deleted audioController and reorganized code for better modularity. - Separated audio visualization into AudioCanvas in the ui directory. - Moved speech synthesis and transcription logic to services for clarity and reuse. - Updated index.html and imports to align with the new structure.

feat: refactor for modular architecture and rename components
- Moved SpeechSynth and Transcriber to utils for better reusability - Renamed AudioCanvas to AudioVisualizer for clarity - Relocated and renamed AudioController to align with ui structure - Adjusted imports and file paths to match the updated organization

fix: rename stopProcessingCleanup to stopProcessing in AudioController
- Standardized method naming for clarity and consistency. - Removed redundant code comment in synthesize.

fix: handle errors in audio transcription and streamline OpenAI integration
- Added error handling for transcription failures in AudioController. - Simplified transcribeAudioWithOpenAI function by removing UI dependencies. - Improved clarity and reliability of error messages during transcription.

fix: improve audio transcription handling and OpenAI integration
- Added error handling for transcription failures in AudioController. - Updated transcribe utility to use gpt-4o-transcribe model. - Streamlined transcription logic and improved reliability
refactor: remove permission wrapper from Permission.ts
chore: remove unused add dependency and update IDE workspace configs

feat: remove legacy audio processing and UI features for codebase overhaul
This commit removes outdated modules including AudioController, AudioVisualizer, and associated UI elements to prepare for a restructured audio processing system and cleaner project architecture. All related utility functions and configurations are also deleted.

chore: update package-lock.json with new dependencies and devDependencies
Add several new dependencies, including TailwindCSS and PostCSS-related packages, alongside their accompanying optional and runtime modules. This update prepares the project for enhanced styling capabilities and improved dependency management.

refactor: remove HalMicVisualizer and add ESLint and TypeScript configurations
Remove `HalMicVisualizer` component and its associated logic since it's no longer needed. Introduce ESLint with `next/core-web-vitals` and `next/typescript` for code quality and consistency. Add a TypeScript declaration file to support Next.js configurations.

This commit adds the `npm.tauri:dev` run configuration and updates related IntelliJ settings. Adjustments include changes to the workspace, RunManager, and shared indexes, ensuring seamless development for the Tauri project.
